libType.value: Enhanced Slave, No FLiRS, No MR

description.lang: Fibaro Wall Plug is a universal, Z-Wave compatible, relay switch in the form of a socket adapter. The Plug may be used to operate any device up to 2,500W power output. The Plug features power consumption measuring and uses a crystal LED ring to visualize the current load by color changing illumination.Fibaro Wall Plug may be operated using the service button located on its casing, or via any Z-Wave compatible controller.
